title: Asian stocks head for fourth weekly gains as tech shares climb
summary: Asian stocks are on track for their best weekly run since May. Technology shares are reaching new highs, driven by strong investor interest in artificial intelligence. title: BluPine raises Rs 5,400 cr loan underwritten by Axis Bank
summary: BluPine Energy, backed by Actis, has secured a significant ₹5,400 crore loan from Axis Bank. This long-term financing will support its renewable energy portfolio. The loan is secured against operating solar and wind assets. BluPine Energy is developing substantial renewable capacity in India. Proceeds will refinance existing borrowings, strengthening its financial position.

title: Moody's upgrades outlook for three key Adani Group firms
summary: Moody's Ratings has upgraded the outlook for three Adani Group companies to stable. Adani Ports, Adani Transmission Step-One, and Adani Electricity Mumbai now have a stable outlook. This reflects improved liquidity and strong financial profiles. The companies are expected to maintain sufficient liquidity for operations and debt obligations over the next 18 months.

title: Banks' credit-to-deposit ratio hits record 81.75% as mobilisation lags
summary: Indian banks' credit-to-deposit ratio hit an all-time high of 81.75% as of December 31, signaling pressure to attract deposits amid robust loan demand. This elevated ratio reflects challenges in deposit mobilization, with investors seeking higher returns elsewhere, and a lag in deposit growth compared to credit expansion.

summary: Silver Touch Technologies has announced a 1:5 stock split and a 1:1 bonus issue, subject to shareholder approval. The move follows a strong rally, aiming to improve liquidity and affordability without altering shareholder value.

title: Sebi proposes introducing trade netting for large foreign investors
summary: The ‍Securities and Exchange Board of ‌India has sought the changes "in order to enhance operational efficiency and ‍reduce cost of funding" for ‍foreign ⁠portfolio ⁠investors, it said in a consultation paper.

title: Tata Tech Q3 results: Revenue from operations climbs nearly 4% YoY; profit plunged 96%, impacted by new labour codes
summary: Tata Tech Q3 results: Revenue from operations climbs nearly 4% YoY; profit plunged 96% due to impact of new labour codes

title: Budget 2026: Preventive care push to Nutraceutical manufacturing: 5 key asks by Healthcare sector
summary: The Indian healthcare sector anticipates an increase in government spending to 2.5%-3% of GDP in the upcoming Union Budget 2026. Experts emphasize the need for enhanced public health allocation, preventive care, and improved infrastructure to address existing gaps and support long-term growth.

title: Tech Mahindra Q3 results: Net profit rises 14% to 1,122 crore YoY; revenue up 8%
summary: Tech Mahindra Q3 results: Net profit rises 14% to 1,122 crore YoY; revenue up 8%

title: Wipro Q3 Results: Net profit drops 7% YoY to  ₹3,119 crore; board announces interim dividend of  ₹6 per share
summary: Wipro reported a Q3 revenue of  ₹23,555 crore, exceeding analysts' estimates of  ₹23,151 crore, and marking a 5.5% YoY growth from  ₹22,318 crore last year. Sequentially, revenue increased by 4% from  ₹22,697 crore in Q2FY26.

title: Bitcoin and ethereum confirm crypto reversal. Where the charts say they are headed
summary: The technical backdrop is beginning to improve for cryptocurrencies.

title: Budget 2026: Focus to be on capex, job creation; FY27 fiscal deficit seen at 4.2%: Morgan Stanley
summary: Budget 2026: Morgan Stanley expects India’s fiscal consolidation to continue in FY27, albeit at a slower pace, with the central government likely to peg the fiscal deficit at 4.2% of GDP, compared with a targeted 4.4% in FY26. This would mark the shallowest pace of consolidation since FY23.

title: JPMorgan ramps up hiring across Europe amid rising investor confidence, says it has ‘capital to deploy’
summary: JPMorgan Chase plans to expand its dealmaking team in Europe, anticipating a strong M&amp;A year in 2026. The bank sees investor confidence growing, &nbsp;and expects favourable conditions for mergers and acquisitions amid low interest rates and stable credit.

title: Vedanta among 8 stocks that hit 52-week high; rally up to 20% in a month
summary: Eight stocks from the BSE 100 index surged to their 52-week highs, marking their strongest levels in the past year. These breakouts are widely viewed by traders and investors as bullish signals.

title: February 1 Budget to make it a working Sunday for stock market traders. BSE, NSE announce schedule
summary: Unioun Budget 2026: In a rare instance, stock exchanges BSE and NSE have decided to keep the equity market open for trading on February 1 despite being a Sunday as Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman would present the Union Budget on that day.

title: Sebi proposes easing cash settlement norms for foreign investors to cut funding costs
summary: Sebi has proposed allowing FPIs to net cash obligations for same-day buy and sell trades. The move aims to lower funding costs, improve efficiency during high-volume days, and ease liquidity stress without raising systemic risk.

title: Budget 2026: Indian stock market to remain open on Sunday, February 1
summary: Indian stock market will remain open on Sunday, February 1 on account of Union Budget 2026, NSE said.

title: Jefferies withdraws from bitcoin, shifts to gold amid concerns of quantum computing
summary: Jefferies' strategist Christopher Wood announced a complete withdrawal of its 10% Bitcoin allocation due to long-term concerns about quantum computing, reallocating funds to gold and gold-mining stocks.&nbsp;

title: Mint Explainer: What the Karnataka HC’s share attachment means for the Aakash rights issue
summary: The Karnataka high court order raises the question of whether Aakash can produce a clean paper trail—shareholding records, beneficial ownership declarations, and the full allotment trail.

title: Madhu Kela picks up stake in this stock market proxy player in Q3
summary: Veteran investor Madhu Kela has bought a stake in Emkay Global. This signals new interest in the financial services firm. Ace investor Dolly Khanna has trimmed her holding. Emkay Global is a diversified financial services company. Kela's entry is watched closely. Khanna's move seems like portfolio rebalancing. The company's shares rose on the news.

title: Amagi Media Labs IPO: Issue subscribed 30 times on Day 03; NII, QIB portions see strong demand, GMP signals 7.5% premium
summary: Amagi Media Labs IPO saw a surge in interest, with a subscription rate of 30.24 times. The  ₹1,788 crore issue attracted bids for 8.2 crore shares. The company aims to enhance technology and fund acquisitions. Listing is set for December 15.

title: DLF to declare Q3FY26 results on this date. Check details
summary: DLF will announce its Q3FY26 financial results on January 22, 2026. The trading window for insiders is closed until 48 hours after the results. The company reported a 15% decline in net profit for the September quarter, despite a significant increase in sales bookings.

title: Reliance Q3 results: 5 key highlights from RIL Q3 earnings
summary: Reliance Q3 results: Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Industries (RIL), on Friday, January 16, reported a nearly 2% year-on-year (YoY) rise in its consolidated profit to  ₹22,167 crore.

title: Sebi plans KYC overhaul to ease client onboarding
summary: Intermediaries must update client KYC records based on information received from KRAs, instead of repeating checks each time a client interacts with a new intermediary, Sebi has proposed.

title: Pulse of the Street: Markets on mute amid mixed Q3 earnings
summary: Markets stayed muted through the week as investors digested mixed early Q3 earnings with little directional clarity. Select heavyweights outperformed, but fragile sentiment and foreign flows kept India lagging emerging market peers.

title: Jio Platforms Q3 profit rises 11% as higher-value users drive growth
summary: Jio Platforms, which houses Reliance Industries Ltd’s telecom and digital services business, reported a 3.4% sequential and 11.2% year-on-year growth in net profit to  ₹7,629 crore during the quarter.

title: RIL Q3 profit up 2% as weak oil production offsets gains across O2C, retail, and telecom
summary: RIL's key oil-to-chemicals segment reported improved earnings in Q3 on the back of elevated fuel cracks - or the margins made by refineries for processing crude oil - across the globe.

title: Reliance Retail Q3 net profit rises 2% to  ₹3,558 crore, revenue jumps record  ₹97,605 crore. Details here
summary: For the quarter ending 31 December 2025, Reliance Retail reported a net profit of 3,558 crore, a 2% rise. Gross revenue hit  ₹97,605 crore, up 8%.

title: Delhi HC rejects Natasha Oberoi’s plea to arbitrate family feud over PRS Oberoi estate
summary: Disputes involving Wills, inheritance, and family succession cannot be decided by private arbitrators and must be settled by civil courts, rules Delhi high court.

title: Thunder on wheels: Coca-Cola expands last-mile reach with micromobility
summary: This direct-to-store delivery, using small vehicles like bikes, and electric vans, helps the company expand last-mile reach, cut reliance on middlemen or traditional wholesale channels, and gain tighter control over costs and profitability.

title: What is China's ‘Are you dead’ app and why is it going viral? Here's how the platform works
summary: A new app in China, designed to check on people living alone, has gone viral. Originally named Sileme, which translates to ‘Are you dead’ in Chinese, it will be rebranded as Demumu for a global audience. Details here.&nbsp;

title: Sebi approves separate auction session to determine closing stock prices
summary: Sebi is revamping how stock closing prices are determined in India's equity cash market, moving from a 30-minute average to a new 20-minute Closing Auction Session (CAS). This move aims to enhance price discovery and transparency, aligning with global practices. Initially, CAS will apply to derivative-linked stocks, with a phased rollout starting August 3, 2026.

title: Sebi overhauls mutual fund rules to boost transparency
summary: Sebi has introduced new regulations effective April 1, 2026, lowering expense ratio caps for mutual funds and implementing a base expense ratio (BER) structure.&nbsp;

title: Gold rates today: MCX gold slips  ₹720 per 10g, silver plunges  ₹7,000 per kg on easing geopolitical worries
summary: Gold and silver prices fell on 16 January due to a stronger US dollar and reduced geopolitical tensions. Gold futures dropped by  ₹721 to  ₹1,42,400, while silver fell nearly  ₹7,000 to  ₹2,84,628 but remained on track for a weekly gain of 14%.

title: SAT sets aside Sebi’s order against Bombay Dyeing, Wadia family
summary: Sebi had in 2022 barred 10 entities, including Bombay Dyeing and its promoters Nusli N. Wadia, Ness Wadia and Jehangir Wadia, from accessing the securities market for up to two years and imposed cumulative penalties of  ₹15.75 crore.

title: Vijay Kedia buys stake in smallcap SPML Infra via bulk deal
summary: Ace investor Vijay Kedia has acquired a stake in SPML Infra. Kedia Securities bought over 14 lakh shares for approximately Rs 25 crore. SPML Infra is a smallcap infrastructure firm with expertise in power, water, and environment sectors. The company has a strong track record of executing projects across India.

title: Stock picks of the week: 5 stocks with consistent score improvement and upside potential of up to 36%
summary: If the current correction and bearish phase continue for a few more weeks, a kind of fatigue could set in on the street. At this juncture, it is important to take into account the fact that the market has its cycles, but the fundamentals of an industry have different cycles. Focus on the fundamentals because, in some cases, geopolitical events will have a fundamental impact on some sectors. Our selected stocks for today depict a strong upward trajectory in their overall average score which is based on five key pillars: Earnings, fundamentals, relative valuation, risk, and price momentum. This implies that there has been a significant improvement in their market outlook in the given time frame.
